title: Fast, Fasting
cleaned_text: - forty days ... he did neither eat bread, nor drink water, [Ex. the child; and David fasted, [2 Sam. 12:16](/study/scriptures/ot/2-sam/12.16?lang=eng#p16). - Proclaim a fast, [1 Kgs. 21:9](/study/scriptures/ot/1-kgs/21.9?lang=eng#p9). - set himself to seek the Lord, and proclaimed a fast throughout all Judah, [2 Chr. 20:3](/study/scriptures/ot/2-chr/20.3?lang=eng#p3). - we fasted and besought our God, [Ezra 8:23](/study/scriptures/ot/ezra/8.23?lang=eng#p23). - Ezra ... did eat no bread, nor drink water, [Ezra 10:6](/study/scriptures/ot/ezra/10.6?lang=eng#p6). - I ... fasted, and prayed before the God, [Neh. 1:4](/study/scriptures/ot/neh/1.4?lang=eng#p4). - children of Israel were assembled with fasting, [Neh. 9:1](/study/scriptures/ot/neh/9.1?lang=eng#p1). - fast ye for me, and neither eat nor drink, [Esth. 4:16](/study/scriptures/ot/esth/4.16?lang=eng#p16). - they had decreed ... the matters of the fastings, [Esth. 9:31](/study/scriptures/ot/esth/9.31?lang=eng#p31). - I humbled my soul with fasting, [Ps. 35:13](/study/scriptures/ot/ps/35.13?lang=eng#p13). - I wept, and chastened my soul with fasting, [Ps. 69:10](/study/scriptures/ot/ps/69.10?lang=eng#p10). - My knees are weak through fasting, [Ps. 109:24](/study/scriptures/ot/ps/109.24?lang=eng#p24). - in the day of your fast ye find pleasure, [Isa. 58:3](/study/scriptures/ot/isa/58.3?lang=eng#p3). - in the Lord's house upon the fasting day, [Jer. 36:6](/study/scriptures/ot/jer/36.6?lang=eng#p6). - king ... passed the night fasting, [Dan. 6:18](/study/scriptures/ot/dan/6.18?lang=eng#p18). - to seek by prayer and supplications, with fasting, [Dan. 9:3](/study/scriptures/ot/dan/9.3?lang=eng#p3). - Sanctify ye a fast, [Joel 1:14](/study/scriptures/ot/joel/1.14?lang=eng#p14). - turn ye even to me with all your heart, and with fasting, [Joel 2:12](/study/scriptures/ot/joel/2.12?lang=eng#p12). - Nineveh believed God, and proclaimed a fast, [Jonah 3:5](/study/scriptures/ot/jonah/3.5?lang=eng#p5). -
